name: Light up the Ghosts
description:
Let's see if you are fast ! A simple and short game where you chase away as many ghosts as you can in 24 seconds.

Play in your browser, on a mobile and on desktop.

Made with my two hands and the great Phaser.

Tell me in comments if you like or encounter problems.

V1.2 :

  • Adjusted ghosts sizes to play on small screens
  • Adjusted window brightness
  • Added MP3 sounds for browsers that don't support Ogg Vorbis

V1.1 :

  • Added moving ghosts
  • Added color schemes
  • Added two sounds for game over
